page.title: 10GUITING POWER.BROWNIE PACK
page.content: The Brownie Movement is 75 years old this year. It was started by Olave, Lady Baden Powell. There are 14 Brownies in our Pack,which meets every Tuesday at 5.30p.m. in the Village Hall. Girls can become Brownies at six and a half years old,but they can't be enrolled until they are seven. The leaving age is eleven. Brownies try to help people, and there are also 30 badges which can be worked for. There is a badge called the Venture Badge which we can get if we go on a Pack Venture or a Brownie trip. Some of the other badges are Athlete,Agility,Animal Lover,Artist, Booklover,Craft,Horserider,Hostess, Knitter,Rambler and Sewing. Thinking Day is on 22nd February when we remember our Founder, and Brownies everywhere.
